lexUnit.name: shred.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: tear or cut into shreds.

sentence.text: Remove any damaged outer leaves from the lettuce , cut it in half , then place cut side down on a board and thinly shred each half , using a sharp knife .
Japan shredded a large proportion of the dolphins it hunted and turned them into fertiliser .
You generally need to remove the thick spine before finely shredding the leaf .
Here they gathered some dry leaves and twigs , and Allen shredded a tinder-old branch with his knife and stuck it upright among the leaves .
Manville checked over his copy of the coded telex transmission before shredding it , unable to repress a bitter smile .
You can use the grating blade of a food processor to shred and grate the vegetables , if you wish .
Worn and defective shoes will be shredded in the US , shipped to Korea and turned into a filter for outsoles ( providing , of course , that this does n't harm the performance ) .

This requires some practise but once the skill is acquired it is far preferable to the alternative method which is to shred the oviduct with fine watchmakers forceps and collect the embryos from among the debris .
Daddy shreds them up -- I saw him doing it with a razor blade , Steph -- and burns them .
“ Nor is Edward … ” continued Louise , shredding the green fronds , sweeping them to the ground .
Next came a leg of Szechuan duck , which our attendant shredded at the table with all the panache of a French waiter filleting a sole .
` I suggested the Bank collect the paper , shred it , bale it and deliver it to the mill , " said Hugh .
He managed to contain himself and somehow he got the hundred into the middle without shredding the notes into little pieces .
The leggy actress has revealed that she now shreds all the rubbish at her Malibu home before putting it out for the dust .
` I have to shred my garbage now , " moans Cher .
Once the robot has confirmed that it has the right kind of plastic by its reading of an identifying bar code , it shreds the material ready for collection .
The council hopes to shred more than a thousand trees this year … turning them into wood chips …
